name: Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery
description: Quirky hotel offering cool rooms & suites, as well as a lounge, a restaurant & Wi-Fi.
address: Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery, 654 Nelson St, Vancouver, BC V6B 6K4

featured_reviews.review_id: My husband and I had a very pleasant stay. Staff were very friendly and ensured we were happy with our room by texting us shortly after going up to our room.  Room was very clean. Bed beautifully made with quality sheets that had that freshly laundered feel. Bathroom was extremely clean. Lovely big shower. Highly recommend Hotel Belmont. We would definitely stay there again.
featured_reviews.review_text: My husband and I had a very pleasant stay. Staff were very friendly and ensured we were happy with our room by texting us shortly after going up to our room.  Room was very clean. Bed beautifully made with quality sheets that had that freshly laundered feel. Bathroom was extremely clean. Lovely big shower. Highly recommend Hotel Belmont. We would definitely stay there again.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Dianne,

Thank you for choosing Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery! We're delighted to hear you and your husband enjoyed your stay. It's wonderful that our staff's friendliness and attention to detail, from the clean room to the quality sheets, made your experience memorable. We appreciate your recommendation and can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: Myself and a friend stayed at the Hotel Belmont in the end of October. We checked in later in the evening as we had a 9 hour drive. Upon checking in we were greeted by staff who had seen us pull into the parking lot and park our car. They had also heard us talking about the parking lot and that we were impressed to find parking that late in the evening, as it took a very long time to check in. Upon checking in they asked all the usual questions. The hotel proceeded to text all throughout the night and next morning making sure everything was fine with our stay, which it was for the most part. We spent the evening coming and going from the hotel and making multiple trips to our vehicle which was parked in view from the lobby with the staff that had checked us in hours prior, and a friendly door person who checked on us each time which we appreciated as two young female travelers. The next morning we woke up early and when to grab something from the car, to find that the car was gone. We went back inside and had staff tell us that they had got the car towed because it was illegally parked. We went to retrieve the car and had to navigate our way around a large unfamiliar city to a not so nice side of town and had to pay over $160 for less then 12 hours of the car being there. Once we retrieved the car and found our way back to the hotel I went back in to figure out parking. I had to wait for the three staff members to bring out two more staff members before I even got to speak to them. Once their crew of five was ready I asked them what was up with the parking and why nobody had mentioned that we needed to purchase a ticket for parking and why nobody had bothered to tell us our car was being taken. They did don't have a response. They then tried to charge us extra for parking the night our car got towed, to which one of the workers told the person billing me to be nice and not overcharge. This was a horrible experience as we were on a time sensitive trip and this completely ruined our day timing wise. We had stayed there before with male counterparts and were treated much better, but when it was two young female they feel the need to try and get more money out of us and deceive us.

featured_reviews.review_id: Some say service standards these days are going backwards - well I would certainly say that is not the case at the Belmont. The service was outstanding. Each staff member that I interacted with were amazing, caring and very friendly. The hotel is in an exciting part of Vancouver with lots of nightlife, dining, etc. I loved the fun decor and attention to detail updating what looks to be an older building in Vancouver. I would stay again - and thank you to the incredible team working during my stay.
featured_reviews.review_text: Some say service standards these days are going backwards - well I would certainly say that is not the case at the Belmont. The service was outstanding. Each staff member that I interacted with were amazing, caring and very friendly. The hotel is in an exciting part of Vancouver with lots of nightlife, dining, etc. I loved the fun decor and attention to detail updating what looks to be an older building in Vancouver. I would stay again - and thank you to the incredible team working during my stay.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Deanne,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery! We're delighted to hear that you found our service outstanding and our team amazing, caring, and friendly. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed our exciting location in Vancouver with its vibrant nightlife and dining options. We take pride in our attention to detail and the fun decor that breathes new life into our historic building. 

We can't wait to welcome you back, and a BIG thank you from the entire team for your kind words!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: We had the best experience at this hotel!! Every single detail was thought out -whether we needed to borrow an umbrella to walk to dinner or borrow bikes, they had it all. The kindest staff ever and always willing to go above and beyond (I wish I remembered specific names but honestly it was everyone)! So so accommodating and provided awesome recommendations. We also loved the access to the restaurant/bar and we didn't hear any music or noise from our room on the 5th floor. The room was spacious, clean and luxurious. We loved the cute details and decor in both the lobby and room. Not to mention the location was great and we were walking distance to all restaurants/activities we wanted to try. I could not recommend this hotel more!! We will be coming back and recommending to all of our friends.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Ann, 

Wow! Your review made our day! We're absolutely thrilled to hear about your amazing experience at our hotel. It's fantastic to know that every detail contributed to making your stay special. Our team takes great pride in going the extra mile, and we're overjoyed to have met your expectations.

We're delighted you found our staff accommodating and enjoyed the recommendations. It's fantastic to hear that you found the room luxurious, clean, and loved the little details in both the room and lobby. Your kind words mean the world to us, and we can't wait to welcome you back and host your friends too! Thank you for recommending us!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had during my recent stay at your hotel. My stay was truly memorable, and I felt compelled to share my positive feedback.

From the moment I entered the lobby, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The check-in process was smooth, and your staff members were not only professional but also incredibly friendly. Their attention to detail and commitment to guest satisfaction were evident throughout my entire stay.

The room I stayed in exceeded my expectations in every way. The cleanliness, modern amenities, and thoughtful touches in the room contributed to a comfortable and enjoyable stay. The attention to detail in the room's design and furnishings did not go unnoticed, and I felt like every aspect of my comfort had been considered.
I would also like to commend your team for their excellent customer service. They were always ready to assist with any inquiries and went above and beyond to ensure that my needs were met promptly and with a smile.

Overall, my experience at your hotel was outstanding, and I will certainly recommend it to friends, family, and colleagues. Thank you for providing such a wonderful environment and for your commitment to excellence. I look forward to the opportunity to stay at your hotel.

Regards,
Simran Sadana

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Simran,

Thank you for the glowing 5-star review! We're thrilled that you had a memorable stay and appreciated our warm atmosphere, smooth check-in, and friendly staff. It's fantastic to hear that your room exceeded expectations and that you enjoyed the thoughtful touches.

We greatly appreciate your commendation of our team's customer service. Your recommendation to friends, family, and colleagues is the highest compliment. We can't wait to welcome you back for another outstanding experience.

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hotel Belmont was conveniently located to a variety of local attractions.  It's a clean place and the room although small was well appointed.  Don't expect to do push ups on the limited floor space.
The lounge was nice for a drink or breakfast.
The best part of our stay was the amazingly helpful,  friendly staff. They all went out of their way to be kind and to be sure we were happy with our vacation.
featured_reviews.review_text:

The best part of our stay was the amazingly helpful,  friendly staff. They all went out of their way to be kind and to be sure we were happy with our vacation.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Deanne,

Thank you for your wonderful review! We're glad you found our location convenient and enjoyed our well-appointed rooms. Our team is thrilled to have made your stay special. If you're looking for more space on your next visit, we have other room types available. We'd love to ensure your future stay is even more comfortable and enjoyable. Looking forward to welcoming you back!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id: Was located in a great location downtown, very clean and well decorated which made the stay quite enjoyable! Lobby smelled quite strongly of perfume, but otherwise the stay was very good. Wish we had been  back during the right hours for the complimentary drinks but that was cool to receive!
featured_reviews.review_text: Was located in a great location downtown, very clean and well decorated which made the stay quite enjoyable! Lobby smelled quite strongly of perfume, but otherwise the stay was very good. Wish we had been  back during the right hours for the complimentary drinks but that was cool to receive!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Kendra, 

Thank you for your fantastic review! We're thrilled you found our downtown location, cleanliness, and decor enjoyable. We appreciate your feedback about the lobby's scent, and we'll certainly look into it. It's great to hear you liked the complimentary drinks, and we hope you'll have the chance to enjoy them during your next visit. We can't wait to welcome you back for another great stay!

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery

featured_reviews.review_id:
Location was nice and was very clean. The staff were also quite friendly and helpful.
But the place was EXTREMELY small. If you just want a place to crash after getting some drinks sure. But for what you pay one would hope there would be more things in the room, or that the size would be bigger.
featured_reviews.review_text:
Location was nice and was very clean. The staff were also quite friendly and helpful.
But the place was EXTREMELY small. If you just want a place to crash after getting some drinks sure. But for what you pay one would hope there would be more things in the room, or that the size would be bigger.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Emmett, 

Thank you for your feedback! We're glad you appreciated our location, cleanliness, and our friendly staff. We understand your concerns about the room size and amenities. We do offer a variety of room categories, some of which are more spacious and offer additional features. For your next stay, we'd be delighted to assist you in choosing a room category that better suits your preferences and ensures a more comfortable experience. Please reach out to us directly, and we'll ensure your next stay exceeds your expectations.

Hotel Belmont Vancouver MGallery
